lead_paragraph: Two readers urge the press to hang tough, while another says President Trump and his aides “are right to fight back against a press that reviles them.”
snippet: Two readers urge the press to hang tough, while another says President Trump and his aides “are right to fight back against a press that reviles them.”...

headline.main: President Trump vs. the Press: Fighting Words
headline.print_headline: The President vs. the Press: Fighting Words
